sample_reviews.author: Nick
sample_reviews.text: Fantastic pizza. Got the margarita pizza and it's light crispy and delicious.   Will definitely be returning to try others!

sample_reviews.author: Ashley Martinez
sample_reviews.text: The pizza was so good, it reminded me of Nee york go here I recommend ittt!!

sample_reviews.author: Snoozecast
sample_reviews.text: WOW. So good. I live in a “pizza desert” down on the Southcoast of MA, so whenever I’m back in RI I am keen to seek my fill of delicious pizza.  I’ve found my new favorite when I was visiting a friend up in Woonsocket. Friendly service, friendly customers, but best of all- the food. Got the lasagna pizza to take home for dinner tonight with the kids. The crust is so chewy and good. The toppings delicious. Also had a great gyro from there for lunch for my long drive home.  Just wished it had more of the yogurt sauce so when I come again will ask for extra.

sample_reviews.author: William Chapman
sample_reviews.text:
I can’t say  enough good things about them. I went in today to find out they have new ownership/ management.  I asked if they made chicken florentine pizza, at that point they stated they wished they had space on the menu.

The owner then comes out and says next time in I’ll make one for you just let me know. I then ordered a Hawaiian pizza and a classic pepperoni.

Fast forward 15 mins the gentlemen brings the pizza to my car door, but there is 3 pizzas? As I look puzzled the worker says the owner made  you the pizza you asked for  chicken florentine.

At this point I’m confused , and ask how much I owe you now, the reply was nothing !!!!

I’ve never had another pizza shop have that act of kindness just to make someone’s day better.

Funny thing was I went to like 5 pizza shops and asked if they make it and everyone of them said no and let me walk out the door.  All I can say is thank you all star pizza!!!!

sample_reviews.author: Michelle Galano (Michelle & Greg Galano)
sample_reviews.text: Best pizza in 40 miles. True Italian flour with a soft delicate crust and perfect chew. These guys know what there doing.

sample_reviews.author: Max Castonguay
sample_reviews.text: Been here a few times and it's always a vibe. I recommend the pizza burger. Its not even on the menu and it's the best one I've ever had. Whoever the chef is knows exactly how to cook! Great service and reasonable prices. Best pizza place around woonsocket straight up.

sample_reviews.author: soufiane tehham
sample_reviews.text: All Star Pizza in Rhode Island exceeded my expectations! The pizza is always fresh, hot, and loaded with delicious toppings. The crust is perfectly cooked—crispy on the outside, soft and chewy on the inside. The staff is friendly, attentive, and makes you feel welcome every time. Delivery is quick and efficient, and the restaurant maintains a clean and comfortable atmosphere. Definitely my go-to spot for pizza in Rhode Island—I highly recommend it!

sample_reviews.author: Josh Brz
sample_reviews.text: Not good anymore, my steak and cheese sandwich was mostly bread.. not impressed

sample_reviews.author: joe frazier
sample_reviews.text: Best steak sandwich ive had ...now im addicted...lol

sample_reviews.author: chenry8871
sample_reviews.text: Great sandwich shop

sample_reviews.author: Bryan Dimascolo
sample_reviews.text: Got a Greek salad and pizza, the pizza was ok but the Greek salad the lettuce was brown and it wasn’t cheap this is unacceptable, can’t people do their job anymore ridiculous!

sample_reviews.author: Ryan Campbell
sample_reviews.text: It's decent pizza. Fluffy crust. Staff was friendly enough. I'll definitely go again but I'll have to be in the mood for fluffy crust

sample_reviews.author: Gia hung Le hoang
sample_reviews.text: Their specialty dishes always stand out.

sample_reviews.author: Keri Dakota (Kerianna)
sample_reviews.text: Excellent steak and cheese grinders hands down one of the best I've had in a long time!!

sample_reviews.author: Patricia Straub
sample_reviews.text: Meatball sub !!! Go get yourself one! Huge and DELISH!!!

sample_reviews.author: Chris S
sample_reviews.text: Service is always great. Had breakfast outside, and one of our group was late, but they didn't make it a big deal or uncomfortable. Good sized portions.

sample_reviews.author: Stacy Corrigan
sample_reviews.text: This is one of our go to breakfast places.  We love the food, service and atmosphere.  Highly recommend!

sample_reviews.author: Dee Malle
sample_reviews.text: Used to be great, but honestly the quality of the food as well as the service has gone downhill.  Service used to be friendly, cheerful, now ya barely get a smile from these waitresses.  Had to ask for splenda three times before it finally arrived. And the steak in the steak omelet reminded me of those steakum type things from the freezer section.  Definitely not worth the $20+ that that build your own omelet ended up costing.  Oh, and the prices have gone up drastically too.

sample_reviews.author: Victor Roman
sample_reviews.text: I love the Bellingham Palace because of their service and food. They always try to go above and  beyond. The more I go, the more I like it.

sample_reviews.author: Joy Young
sample_reviews.text: I have been coming here for years the food is always wonderful! Although my palate has changed since being a child and ordering chocolate chip pancakes. Today we ordered the Irish Benedict and the chicken and waffles both dishes were phenomenal!! Our server was so friendly and attentive. She even had the kitchen divide each order in to 2 plates so we were able to sample. That was such a great idea.

sample_reviews.author: Jeff
sample_reviews.text:
Ok to start so called famous homefries were basic left over boiled potatos no
Flavor! Bacon was like 1 pc cut in half!
And to top it off the bill for 2 people for breakfast was 51.dollars plus  tip 60 bucks! Rip off.
